heroIntro: Welcome to your new golf lifestyle at La Finca Golf, Algorfa. This exceptional 3-bedroom villa offers the perfect base for serious golfers and those seeking the authentic Costa Blanca experience away from crowded coastal developments. At €495,000, this property represents outstanding value—premium specification at 50% less than comparable homes in nearby coastal towns. The villa sits within one of Spain's most respected golf communities, where championship courses define daily life and the fairway becomes your backyard. With 108m² of thoughtfully designed living space set on a 210m² plot, this home delivers everything needed for the golf lifestyle: proximity to La Finca Golf's acclaimed 18-hole course, convenient access to nearby championship layouts at Lo Romero and La Marquesa, and membership to a vibrant international community of golfers. Whether you're planning to make this your primary residence, establish a holiday retreat, or generate rental income (typical €900 per week), this property combines practical investment potential with genuine lifestyle appeal for the serious golfer.
areaSection: Algorfa is a charming inland village in the Vega Baja region of Alicante, positioned perfectly between the coastal attractions of the Costa Blanca and the quieter countryside. Located approximately 25 minutes from Torrevieja's beaches and just 35 minutes from Alicante International Airport, the village maintains an authentic Spanish atmosphere while catering to international residents. The area enjoys over 300 days of Mediterranean sunshine annually, with mild winters and warm summers ideal for year-round golf. Unlike the overcrowded coastal strips, Algorfa offers genuine tranquility—tree-lined streets, local markets, and a genuine community feel. The Vega Baja's agricultural heritage means fresh produce is abundant and affordable. The town's elevation provides excellent drainage and prevents the coastal humidity issues found in beachfront areas, making it particularly comfortable for active lifestyles.
lifestyleSection: Living in Algorfa as a golfer means embracing a rhythm centered around the fairway, with genuine community built around shared passion. The international golf community here is mature and welcoming, with English widely spoken at La Finca Golf's clubhouse and throughout the resort. Your daily life includes easy access to championship courses, weekly competitions, and the famous 19th hole gatherings where friendships form over discussions of that morning's round. Beyond golf, Algorfa offers farmers' markets on weekends, local Spanish restaurants serving authentic paella and fresh seafood at reasonable prices, and quiet country lanes perfect for cycling. Nearby Guardamar and La Mata beaches are just 15-20 minutes away for days when you want coastal relaxation. The expat community is well-established and integrated, with excellent support networks. Healthcare is accessible through modern facilities in Torrevieja, and the village maintains all essential services—supermarkets, banks, and pharmacies—within walking distance or a short drive.
investmentSection: This property represents genuine investment opportunity within Costa Blanca's strongest growth corridor. Algorfa has experienced 12% year-on-year price appreciation, significantly outpacing general regional trends. At €4,583 per m², you're acquiring premium specification at 50% less than equivalent properties in Torrevieja or other coastal towns—the price differential reflects location rather than quality. Rental demand remains strong within the golf community, with typical weekly rental rates of €900, delivering approximately 6-7% annual gross returns for holiday lettings. The property's location within La Finca Golf—one of Spain's most established and respected golf developments—provides built-in buyer interest and liquidity. For golfers considering relocation, the home offers immediate occupancy and full lifestyle integration. The combination of appreciation potential, rental income capability, and genuine personal use value creates a balanced investment profile.
conclusion: This villa at La Finca Golf represents a genuine opportunity to join Spain's most respected golf community at outstanding value. Whether you're relocating permanently to the golf lifestyle, establishing a holiday retreat, or seeking investment with strong rental potential, this property delivers on all fronts: modern comfort, championship golf access, established international community, and sound financial returns. The combination of location, specification, and price positioning makes this one of the most compelling opportunities currently available in Algorfa. Contact us today via WhatsApp or phone to arrange your private viewing and discover why serious golfers choose La Finca Golf as their Costa Blanca home.

lifeAndAmenities.intro: Algorfa offers a carefully balanced lifestyle combining modern convenience with authentic Spanish living. Essential services are close at hand, while major facilities in Torrevieja are just 20 minutes away. The village maintains that rare combination of tranquility and accessibility.

healthcare.text: Medical care in the Algorfa area is comprehensive and accessible. The Hospital de Torrevieja, located just 20 minutes away, is a modern private hospital with full emergency services, English-speaking doctors, and specialist departments. For routine healthcare, a well-equipped local health center operates in the village with regular visiting doctors and nursing staff. Many residents maintain private health insurance through international providers, which covers treatment at Torrevieja's excellent facilities. Prescription medications are readily available and significantly less expensive than in northern Europe. The area is popular with retirees specifically because healthcare quality and accessibility are outstanding.

education.text: For families, international schooling options are readily available within 25 minutes. El Limonar International School provides British curriculum education and is popular with expat families throughout the region. Several additional international schools operate in the Torrevieja area offering British, American, and Spanish curricula. Local Spanish schools in Algorfa itself serve the village community and offer excellent value for families seeking Spanish-language education. Most expat families utilize either private international schools or combine Spanish public school education with supplementary international tutoring.

shopping.text: Daily shopping is convenient throughout Algorfa. Mercadona supermarket in nearby Rojales (10 minutes) offers excellent product selection and competitive prices. The village itself maintains local shops for daily essentials, and a farmers' market operates on weekends with fresh local produce, vegetables, and seasonal fruits at exceptional value. Torrevieja's large shopping centers are 25 minutes away for more extensive retail needs, including international brands and specialty shops. Supermarkets in the region are well-stocked with both Spanish and international products, accommodating diverse dietary preferences common among expat residents.

transport.text: A personal vehicle is essential in Algorfa, as public transportation is limited. Alicante International Airport is 35 minutes away by car, with excellent highway connections making travel straightforward. Bus services connect to Torrevieja (20 minutes) and provide regional links, but frequencies are limited. The village atmosphere and distances are ideal for cycling, with quiet country roads suitable for recreational riding. Parking throughout the area is abundant and free. For those using public transport regularly, Torrevieja's bus station offers connections to coastal towns and major regional centers.
